mcq.statement: Which of the following is correctly paired with its function? Mitochondria : Store lipids, Ribosomes : Work more efficiently in acidic medium, Lysosomes : It is a single celled organelle for packing, Golgi bodies : Formation of polysaccharides

options.b: Ribosomes : Work more efficiently in acidic medium
options.c: Lysosomes : It is a single celled organelle for packing
